bug.author: zmunro
bug.summary: Receiving ingress spec error when trying to follow tutorial
bug.description:
/kind bug
I was following the setup guide <denchmark-link:https://www.kubeflow.org/docs/gke/deploy/deploy-ui/>here</denchmark-link> and I decided to use the username and password option to connect to Kubeflow. When I hit create deployment, it got stuck on and just kept printing that out for an hour. The was stuck on "Creating" so I clicked on it and there was an error at the top of the page that said . Sure enough the spec for that service says . Not sure what is going on but something is busted. What did you expect to happen: Kubeflow to be initialized without any hassles and the ingress to be initialized.
I used the UI <denchmark-link:https://deploy.kubeflow.cloud/#/deploy>here</denchmark-link> to create the deployment. Environment: Brave browser
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): kfctl version: (use kfctl version): not used Kubernetes platform: GKE Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.1", GitCommit:"4485c6f18cee9a5d3c3b4e523bd27972b1b53892", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-07-18T09:18:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11+", GitVersion:"v1.11.10-gke.6", GitCommit:"feb35bccc781d4b5d16125f53e396fe2643d6618", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-07-26T17:47:00Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.8b4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): MacOS

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zmunro>@zmunro</denchmark-link> Which version of Kubeflow did you try to deploy? /cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kunmingg>@kunmingg</denchmark-link>
Hi, I am also facing the same problem with the UI deployment on v0.6.2
We just released 0.7.0 which fixes a number of bugs. Please try the latest release and if you are still having problems please open a new issue.
